abstract: The bank will inject $1 billion across six highly leveraged municipal bond funds with $15 billion in assets, which were sold under the names ASTA and MAT.
snippet: The bank will inject $1 billion across six highly leveraged municipal bond funds with $15 billion in assets, which were sold under the names ASTA and MAT.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup, the banking giant, moved Monday to shore up six of its hedge funds pressured by a tightening in the municipal bond market, the newest problem to entangle the struggling company.

headline.main: Citigroup Acts to Bolster Hedge Funds
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Acts to Bolster Hedge Funds
